Bloodline Celestial: Summoned creatures gain DR 1/evil
Channel Energy: R30' May heal or inflict 6d6 HP (DC 18 Will half) 8/dy
Elven Magic: +2 checks to overcome spell resistance
Eschew Materials: May cast spells w/out materials
Extend Spell: May use +1 spell slot to dbl chosen spell duration
Healer's Blessing: Cure spells heal 50% more HP
Heavenly Fire: R30' Ranged touch heals good or harms evil 1d4+0 HP 6/dy
Nimbus Of Light: 30' radius Daylight inflicts 11 HP on undead 11 rd/dy
Rebuke Death: Touch restores 1d4+5 HP to creature below 0 HP 6/dy
Selective Channeling: May withhold Channel Energy effects from up to 3 targets
Spontaneous Cleric Spell: May cast Cure or Inflict in place of known spell
Sun's Blessing: Channel Energy inflicts +11 HP on undead and negates channel resistance
